name: df-dib
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cdib, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cmpt(s2, cdm(cfv(cfv(cdia, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cxp(cfv(cfv(cfv(cdia, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), csn(cmpt(s3, cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cres(cid, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ DIsoB =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà dom(((DIsoA ` s0)` s1))‚Ü¶((((DIsoA ` s0)` s1)` s2)√ó {(s3 ‚àà((LTrn ` s0)` s1)‚Ü¶(= |`(Base ` s0)))}))))
comment: Isomorphism B is isomorphism A extended with an extra dimension set to the zero vector component i.e. the zero endormorphism. Its domain is lattice elements less than or equal to the fiducial co-atom ` w ` . (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)
